## What is the classic ketogenic diet (KD)?

.pull-right[.enlarge[
* Ratio 4:1 <br><br>
    + fat:carbohydrate + protein <br><br>
* Fats converted to ketone bodies  <br><br>
* Ketones as efficient fuel source
]]


---

## Reported therapeutic effects <br><br> 

.enlarge[
- Intractable epilepsy      (PMID: 26222258) <br><br>
- Detox for alcohol abuse   (PMID: 33837086) <br><br>
- Refractory BPD, SCZ, MDD  (PMID: 35873236) <br><br>

]

## Astrocytes also generate ketones

.pull-right[.enlarge[
- Excess high fat produces excess ketone bodies  <br><br>
- Loss of sensitivity to:
    insulin, leptin, ghrelin (PMID:27122369)<br><br>
- Antipsychotics interfer with these hormones] 

]

## Symptoms of metabolic disorders <br> shared with SCZ & BPD

•	Weight gain 
•	Dyslipedemia                             
•	Cardiovascular disease
•	Cognitive impairment
•	Sleep disturbances
•	Loss of quality of life
